file_intent: Index barrel that re-exports services, models, and core utilities

responsibility_blocks.description: Aggregate and re-export core service classes (UserService, ProductService, OrderService, AuthService) to provide a single entry point for business logic
responsibility_blocks.label: Public API surface for services

responsibility_blocks.description: Aggregate and re-export common TypeScript types for models (User, UserProfile, Product, ProductQuery, Order, OrderStatus, AuthToken, LoginRequest)
responsibility_blocks.label: Public API surface for models (types)

responsibility_blocks.description: Expose application bootstrap and infrastructure helpers (createApp, connectDatabase, createLogger, config)
responsibility_blocks.label: Core application bootstrap and infrastructure exports
